skills.name: agent-activity-monitor
skills.description: Collects and visualizes statistics regarding the agent's activities, including skill usage, execution success rates, and task duration. Provides a data-driven dashboard for ecosystem health.

skills.name: ai-ethics-auditor
skills.description: Audits AI systems for bias, fairness, and privacy. Analyzes prompts and datasets to ensure ethical and safe AI implementation.

skills.name: ai-model-orchestrator
skills.description: Dynamically selects the optimal AI model based on task complexity, cost, and latency. Routes requests to Gemini, GPT-4, Claude, or local LLMs to maximize efficiency.

skills.name: api-doc-generator
skills.description: Generate API documentation from OpenAPI specs or code.

skills.name: api-evolution-manager
skills.description: Governs the evolution of public APIs. Detects breaking changes, manages deprecation cycles, and generates migration guides for clients.

skills.name: api-fetcher
skills.description: Fetch data from REST/GraphQL APIs securely.

skills.name: audio-transcriber
skills.description: Transcribe audio/video files to text using OpenAI Whisper.

skills.name: auto-context-mapper
skills.description: Intelligently links related knowledge assets across tiers. Automatically fetches prerequisite data and high-level mission context for any task.

skills.name: automated-support-architect
skills.description: Generates high-quality user support assets (FAQs, Troubleshooting Guides, Chatbot Knowledge) directly from source code and requirements. Bridges the gap between developers and end-users.

skills.name: autonomous-skill-designer
skills.description: The ultimate "self-generation" skill. Autonomously designs and implements new Gemini skills to solve novel problems that current skills cannot address.

skills.name: backlog-connector
skills.description: Specialized connector for Nulab Backlog API. Automatically resolves Project IDs and handles pagination for fetching issues and wikis.

skills.name: binary-archaeologist
skills.description: Reverse engineers legacy binaries and "black box" executables to extract logic and dependencies. Re-integrates lost institutional assets into modern codebases.

skills.name: biometric-context-adapter
skills.description: Infers user stress/energy levels from interaction patterns (typing speed, error rate). Adjusts response verbosity and visualizes mood via a "Niko-Niko Calendar."

skills.name: boilerplate-genie
skills.description: Scaffolds new projects with best practices (CI/CD, Tests, Linting) pre-configured. Ensures a "healthy" starting point for Next.js, FastAPI, Node.js, and more.

skills.name: box-connector
skills.description: Securely connects to Box using the Node.js SDK (JWT). downloads files, searches content, and manages folder structures.

skills.name: browser-navigator
skills.description: Automates browser actions using Playwright CLI. Can record, replay, and generate browser automation scenarios stored in the knowledge base. Useful for UI testing, data extraction, and visual auditing.

skills.name: budget-variance-tracker
skills.description: Compares actual spend and revenue against forecasts. Provides variance analysis and corrective insights to ensure financial discipline.

skills.name: bug-predictor
skills.description: Predicts future bug hotspots by analyzing code complexity, churn, and historical defect patterns. Warns developers before a bug is even written.

skills.name: business-growth-planner
skills.description: Helps define long-term business goals, market entry strategies, and revenue streams. Translates CEO vision into structured OKRs and growth pillars.

skills.name: business-impact-analyzer
skills.description: Translates engineering metrics (DORA, error rates, technical debt) into business KPIs and financial impact. Helps justify technical investments to stakeholders.

skills.name: chaos-monkey-orchestrator
skills.description: Injects managed chaos into environments to test system resilience. Validates that self-healing and monitoring systems work as expected under stress.

skills.name: cloud-cost-estimator
skills.description: Estimates monthly cloud infrastructure costs from IaC files (Terraform, CloudFormation). Helps align architecture with budget constraints.

skills.name: cloud-waste-hunter
skills.description: Actively identifies and eliminates unused or over-provisioned cloud resources. Goes beyond estimation to hunt for actual cost savings in live environments.

skills.name: code-lang-detector
skills.description: Detect programming language of source code.

skills.name: codebase-mapper
skills.description: Maps the directory structure of the project to help the AI understand the codebase layout.

skills.name: competitive-intel-strategist
skills.description: Analyzes competitor releases and market trends to propose technical differentiation strategies. Ensures our products stay ahead by leveraging our unique code assets.

skills.name: completeness-scorer
skills.description: Evaluate text completeness based on criteria.

skills.name: compliance-officer
skills.description: Maps technical state to regulatory standards (SOC2, ISO27001, etc.). Generates real-time compliance scores and audit-ready evidence reports.

skills.name: connection-manager
skills.description: Manages secure connections to external tools (AWS, Slack, Jira, Box). Validates credentials in the Personal Tier and injects them into the execution context.

skills.name: context-injector
skills.description: Inject knowledge into JSON data context.

skills.name: crisis-manager
skills.description: Provides rapid response during production incidents or critical security breaches. Coordinates diagnostics, temporary fixes, and post-mortem data collection.

skills.name: data-anonymizer
skills.description: Masks sensitive fields in JSON data for safe sharing.

skills.name: data-collector
skills.description: Fetches data from URLs (Web/API) and saves it to a local directory with metadata (timestamp, source, hash) for traceability. Supports incremental updates.

skills.name: data-lineage-guardian
skills.description: Tracks the flow and integrity of data across the entire stack. Monitors data quality, ensures "Right to be Forgotten" compliance, and visualizes data lineage.

skills.name: data-transformer
skills.description: Convert between CSV, JSON, and YAML formats.

skills.name: dataset-curator
skills.description: Prepares and audits high-quality datasets for AI/RAG applications. Cleans noise, structure data, and ensures privacy compliance in knowledge bases.

skills.name: db-extractor
skills.description: Extract schema and sample data from databases for analysis.

skills.name: dependency-grapher
skills.description: Generate dependency graphs (Mermaid/DOT) from project files.

skills.name: dependency-lifeline
skills.description: Proactively monitors and plans library updates. Assesses the risk of breaking changes and proposes safe update paths.

skills.name: diagram-renderer
skills.description: Converts diagram code (Mermaid, PlantUML) into image files (PNG/SVG). Useful for visualizing text-based architecture diagrams, flowcharts, and sequence diagrams.

skills.name: diff-visualizer
skills.description: Generate a visual difference report between two texts.

skills.name: disaster-recovery-planner
skills.description: Generates actionable Disaster Recovery (DR) runbooks from infrastructure and requirements. Validates IaC for resilience (backups, redundancy).

skills.name: doc-sync-sentinel
skills.description: Automatically synchronizes documentation with code changes. Detects drift between source code and READMEs, Wikis, or comments, and suggests autonomous updates.

skills.name: doc-to-text
skills.description: Extract text content from various file formats. Supports PDF, Excel, Word, Images (OCR), Email, and ZIP Archives. Use for summarizing or analyzing binary files.

skills.name: doc-type-classifier
skills.description: Classify document type (meeting-notes, spec, etc).

skills.name: document-generator
skills.description: Unified gateway for all document generation tasks. Automatically routes to specialized artisan skills based on the requested format (PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, HTML).

skills.name: domain-classifier
skills.description: Classify domain (tech, finance, legal).

skills.name: ecosystem-integration-test
skills.description: Validates the interoperability between skills. Ensures that output formats (JSON/Markdown) from one skill are correctly consumed by the next in a chain.

skills.name: encoding-detector
skills.description: Detect file encoding and line endings.

skills.name: environment-provisioner
skills.description: Generates Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, Docker, K8s) based on interactive requirements. The creative counterpart to terraform-arch-mapper.

skills.name: excel-artisan
skills.description: Generates and edits Excel (.xlsx) files. Capable of converting JSON/CSV/HTML to Excel, modifying cell values, and applying basic formatting. Use when you need to produce Excel reports or modify existing spreadsheets.

skills.name: executive-reporting-maestro
skills.description: Synthesizes technical data into professional external reports for PMOs and stakeholders. Focuses on ROI, milestones, and high-level project health.

skills.name: financial-modeling-maestro
skills.description: Generates and analyzes financial models, P&L forecasts, and cash flow projections. Transforms business assumptions into multi-year financial statements.

skills.name: format-detector
skills.description: Detect text format (JSON, YAML, CSV, etc.) and confidence.

skills.name: github-repo-auditor
skills.description: Audits and classifies GitHub repositories into business solutions.

skills.name: github-skills-manager
skills.description: Comprehensive management suite for Gemini skills. Features an interactive dashboard to create, install, sync (git), and manage dependencies for skills in a monorepo or individual repositories.

skills.name: glossary-resolver
skills.description: Resolve terms using glossary.

skills.name: google-workspace-integrator
skills.description: Automates Google Docs, Sheets, and Mail. Generates reports, tracks KPIs in spreadsheets, and drafts professional emails for stakeholders.

skills.name: html-reporter
skills.description: Generate standalone HTML reports from JSON/Markdown.

skills.name: intent-classifier
skills.description: Classify intent of text (request, question, report).

skills.name: investor-readiness-audit
skills.description: Prepares documents and audits for fundraising or board meetings. Ensures financial, technical, and compliance data is boardroom-ready.

skills.name: ip-profitability-architect
skills.description: Designs business and licensing models for internal intellectual property. Transforms IP from a protection cost into a revenue-generating asset.

skills.name: ip-strategist
skills.description: Identifies and protects intellectual property within the codebase. Drafts initial patent applications and IP reports for innovative algorithms or designs.

skills.name: issue-to-solution-bridge
skills.description: Automates the entire lifecycle from issue detection to solution. Interprets bug reports or feature requests and orchestrates other skills to implement and test the fix.

skills.name: jira-agile-assistant
skills.description: Automates Jira operations (Cloud/On-prem). Creates issues, updates sprints, and synchronizes the backlog with the technical roadmap.

skills.name: kernel-compiler
skills.description: Compiles core utilities into standalone binaries (Go/Rust) to reduce runtime dependencies. Ensures the ecosystem's "Self-Bootstrapping" capability.

skills.name: knowledge-auditor
skills.description: Audits the 3-tier knowledge base for consistency, freshness, and cross-tier contradictions. Ensures that proprietary standards align with (or intentionally override) public ones.

skills.name: knowledge-fetcher
skills.description: Fetch knowledge from both public and confidential directories. Bridges general best practices with proprietary internal standards.

skills.name: knowledge-harvester
skills.description: Clones external Git repositories and analyzes them to extract valuable knowledge. Converts discovered prompts, rules, and patterns into local knowledge assets.

skills.name: knowledge-refiner
skills.description: Maintains and consolidates the knowledge base. Cleans up unstructured data and merges it into structured glossaries or patterns.

skills.name: lang-detector
skills.description: Detect natural language of text (ja, en, etc.).

skills.name: layout-architect
skills.description: Converts visual designs (images/screenshots) into implementation code (CSS, Python-pptx, HTML). Use when recreating slide layouts or UI designs from images.

skills.name: license-auditor
skills.description: Scans project dependencies for license compliance risks. Identifies restrictive licenses (GPL, AGPL) and generates mandatory attribution (NOTICE) files.

skills.name: local-reviewer
skills.description: Retrieves git diff of staged files for pre-commit AI code review.

skills.name: localization-maestro
skills.description: Manages global expansion by automating i18n workflows and auditing for cultural/regional appropriateness. Handles formats, currency, and sensitive localized expressions.

skills.name: log-analyst
skills.description: Reads the tail of a log file to help analyze recent errors or behavior.

skills.name: log-to-requirement-bridge
skills.description: Analyzes runtime errors and logs to draft improvement requirements. Bridges the gap between Operations and Development.

skills.name: mission-control
skills.description: Orchestrates multiple skills to achieve high-level goals. Acts as the brain of the ecosystem to coordinate complex workflows across the SDLC.

skills.name: monitoring-config-auditor
skills.description: Audits infrastructure code (Terraform, K8s) for monitoring compliance. Ensures alarms, thresholds, and notification paths are set up correctly according to best practices.

skills.name: nonfunctional-architect
skills.description: Interactive guide for defining non-functional requirements based on IPA "Non-Functional Requirements Grade 2018". Helps users select appropriate service levels (Availability, Performance, Security, etc.) and generates a requirements definition document.

skills.name: onboarding-wizard
skills.description: Generates a personalized project guide for new members. Analyzes the codebase and skills to help someone get productive in day one.

skills.name: operational-runbook-generator
skills.description: Generates detailed, step-by-step operational runbooks for day-to-day tasks (scaling, patching, updates). Ensures consistency and safety with built-in rollback procedures.

skills.name: pdf-composer
skills.description: Generate PDF documents from Markdown with headers/footers.

skills.name: performance-monitor-analyst
skills.description: Correlates performance targets with actual profiling results. Identifies bottlenecks and validates against non-functional requirements.

skills.name: pmo-governance-lead
skills.description: Fulfills the role of a PMO by overseeing project quality gates, risks, and cross-skill alignment. Enforces IPA and industry standards across the lifecycle.

skills.name: post-quantum-shield
skills.description: Audits codebases for quantum-vulnerable cryptography and plans migration to Post-Quantum Cryptography (PQC) standards to ensure long-term data security.

skills.name: ppt-artisan
skills.description: Create and convert PowerPoint presentations from Markdown using Marp. Use when the user wants to generate slides, manage themes, or convert MD to PPTX/PDF.

skills.name: pr-architect
skills.description: Crafts descriptive and high-quality Pull Request bodies. Analyzes code changes to explain "Why", "How", and the "Impact" of the work.

skills.name: project-health-check
skills.description: Audits the project for modern and Waterfall standards (SDLC, CI/CD, Tests, Quality Metrics) and provides a health score with improvement suggestions.

skills.name: prompt-optimizer
skills.description: Self-improves agent instructions and context handling. Analyzes failed or suboptimal responses to refine system prompts and prompt templates.

skills.name: quality-scorer
skills.description: Evaluates technical and textual quality based on IPA benchmarks and readability standards.

skills.name: red-team-adversary
skills.description: Performs active security "war gaming" by attempting to exploit identified vulnerabilities in a sandbox. Validates threat reality beyond static scans.

skills.name: refactoring-engine
skills.description: Executes large-scale architectural refactoring and technical debt reduction across the entire codebase. Ensures consistency with modern design patterns.

skills.name: release-note-crafter
skills.description: Generates business-value-focused release notes by correlating Git logs with requirements. Focuses on "what's new" for users and stakeholders.

skills.name: requirements-wizard
skills.description: Guide for creating and reviewing requirements definitions based on IPA standards. Provides best practices for business analysis, process mapping, data modeling, and review checklists.

skills.name: scenario-multiverse-orchestrator
skills.description: Generates multiple business scenarios (Growth/Stability/Hybrid) from financial and strategic assumptions for executive decision-making.

skills.name: schema-inspector
skills.description: Automatically locates and displays schema definition files (SQL, Prisma, OpenAPI, etc.).

skills.name: schema-validator
skills.description: Validate JSON against schemas and identify best match.

skills.name: security-scanner
skills.description: Scans the codebase for security risks, including hardcoded secrets (API keys, tokens), dangerous code patterns (eval, shell injection), and insecure configurations. Use to audit code before committing or reviewing.

skills.name: self-healing-orchestrator
skills.description: Automatically repairs known production issues by applying patches, rollbacks, or config changes. The autonomous counterpart to crisis-manager.

skills.name: sensitivity-detector
skills.description: Detect PII and sensitive information in text.

skills.name: sequence-mapper
skills.description: Generate Mermaid sequence diagrams from source code function calls.

skills.name: skill-bundle-packager
skills.description: Dynamically bundles mission-specific skills into specialized subsets. Optimizes agent performance by focusing on relevant tools for specific high-level tasks.

skills.name: skill-evolution-engine
skills.description: Enables skills to self-improve by analyzing execution logs and user feedback. Automatically refines SKILL.md and scripts to fix recurring failures.

skills.name: skill-quality-auditor
skills.description: Self-audit tool for the Gemini Skills monorepo. Ensures SKILL.md quality, script functionality, and test coverage for all skills.

skills.name: slack-communicator-pro
skills.description: Manages high-fidelity notifications and team engagement on Slack. Sends automated summaries, alerts, and strategic announcements.

skills.name: sovereign-memory
skills.description: Multi-tier, persistent memory hub. Manages facts across Personal, Confidential, and Public tiers in accordance with the Sovereign Knowledge Protocol.

skills.name: sovereign-sync
skills.description: Syncs specific knowledge tiers with external private repositories.

skills.name: stakeholder-communicator
skills.description: Translates technical decisions and architectural changes into clear, business-oriented language for non-technical stakeholders (Execs, Marketing, Sales).

skills.name: strategic-roadmap-planner
skills.description: Analyzes code complexity, technical debt, and industry trends to propose a 3-month strategic roadmap. Aligns engineering effort with business ROI.

skills.name: sunset-architect
skills.description: Manages the graceful decommissioning of underused or high-maintenance features. Plans deprecation cycles, handles data archiving, and generates migration paths for legacy users.

skills.name: supply-chain-sentinel
skills.description: Protects the software supply chain by generating SBoMs and auditing dependency provenance. Monitors for malicious packages and maintenance risks.

skills.name: sustainability-consultant
skills.description: Estimates the environmental impact (Carbon Footprint) of code and infrastructure. Recommends optimizations for energy efficiency and "GreenOps".

skills.name: synthetic-user-persona
skills.description: Generates diverse AI user personas to autonomously test applications. Simulates beginners, power users, and users with accessibility needs to discover hidden UI/UX flaws.

skills.name: talent-requirement-generator
skills.description: Identifies the ideal human skills needed for the project's next phase. Analyzes technical debt, roadmap, and current team gaps to generate job descriptions and coding challenges.

skills.name: tech-dd-analyst
skills.description: Performs Technical Due Diligence on startups. Analyzes code (if available) or evaluates public signals (hiring, blogs) to assess technical risk and team maturity.

skills.name: tech-stack-librarian
skills.description: Autonomously researches and compiles best practices for specific tools (SaaS/OSS). Fetches official docs and structures them into the knowledge base.

skills.name: technology-porter
skills.description: Executes large-scale migrations across language stacks (e.g., C++ to Rust, JS to Go). Preserves logic equivalence while optimizing for the target language's idioms.

skills.name: telemetry-insight-engine
skills.description: Analyzes real-world telemetry and usage data to identify feature gaps and usability issues. Feeds insights back into the requirements phase.

skills.name: template-renderer
skills.description: Render text from templates (Mustache/EJS) and data.

skills.name: terraform-arch-mapper
skills.description: Generates a system architecture diagram from Terraform code. It parses .tf files to identify resources and relationships, then produces a diagram code (Mermaid/PlantUML). Use to visualize infrastructure.

skills.name: test-genie
skills.description: Executes the project's test suite and returns the output for AI analysis.

skills.name: test-suite-architect
skills.description: Generates comprehensive test code (Jest, Pytest, Cypress) from requirements and test viewpoints. Enables Test-Driven Development (TDD) at scale.

skills.name: test-viewpoint-analyst
skills.description: Generates and reviews test scenarios based on IPA non-functional grade standards. Analyzes system requirements to identify critical test viewpoints for performance, security, and availability.

skills.name: token-economist
skills.description: Minimizes token consumption and costs by optimizing data input. Performs smart summarization and chunking of large files without losing critical context.

skills.name: unit-economics-optimizer
skills.description: Analyzes LTV, CAC, and churn to ensure product profitability. Proposes pricing and customer retention strategies to maximize unit margins.

skills.name: ux-auditor
skills.description: Performs visual and structural UX/Accessibility audits on web interfaces. Analyzes screenshots to recommend improvements for usability and contrast.

skills.name: visionary-ethos-keeper
skills.description: Ensures decisions and proposals align with company mission, values, and ethical guidelines. Checks for bias, privacy, and fairness concerns.

skills.name: voice-command-listener
skills.description: Captures microphone input and transcribes it into text commands. Uses SoX for recording and OpenAI Whisper for high-accuracy transcription to control the agent via voice.

skills.name: voice-interface-maestro
skills.description: Converts text responses into spoken audio (TTS). Supports multiple voice personas (Professional, Energetic, Calm) and secure configuration via the Personal Tier.

skills.name: word-artisan
skills.description: Generate Word documents (.docx) from Markdown.
